adrFormatAddress: 323 Madison St, New York, NY 10002-5706, USA

originalText.text: I only use their wash and fold service. I drop off my laundry and then pick it up later. The price for this has gone up some over the years, but still a good deal to me. They're always happy to see me and we have a good relationship. I don't recall them ever messing up my clothes.

text.text: I only use their wash and fold service. I drop off my laundry and then pick it up later. The price for this has gone up some over the years, but still a good deal to me. They're always happy to see me and we have a good relationship. I don't recall them ever messing up my clothes.

originalText.text: Decent place, but it totally needs a facelift. Medium machines are $2 and the large ones are $3. For a quarter you get 6min on the dryer. While waiting on your clothes you can play couple of lottos and test your luck. Does not have a sitting area so you will be standing around alot.

text.text: Decent place, but it totally needs a facelift. Medium machines are $2 and the large ones are $3. For a quarter you get 6min on the dryer. While waiting on your clothes you can play couple of lottos and test your luck. Does not have a sitting area so you will be standing around alot.

originalText.text: This laundry takes up all of the washers and dryers for their laundry service drop off customers. Also do not leave anything there, or drop a coin cause one of the asian ladies will swoop by and take it from you and get lost in the crowd, and you won't be able to tell which one of the women took it.

originalText.text: My sister said it's horrible don't go if u don't have to.....my husband just bought her a washer and dryer to suprise her for Christmas so she won't have to deal with this anymore hes the best

text.text: My sister said it's horrible don't go if u don't have to.....my husband just bought her a washer and dryer to suprise her for Christmas so she won't have to deal with this anymore hes the best

originalText.text: Damn! I swear a month ago the dryer was quarter for eight minutes, two weeks ago it was a quarter for six, today you get four minutes. GTFOH. The dryer machines run warm, the ones that actually work are mostly used for private use.
